Text: Does complete edition mean every DLC available? Thanks.
And thank you for the upload!!

Yes, of course every DLC is available in complete edition. They are all repacked.
Every DLC, latest official patch, latest unofficial patch, and a few other things. The address of the original torrent, by the way:

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6722035/Fallout_3_(Complete_Edition)_-illiria

Thanks again, illiria.

These releases help negate my hatred for Steam.

Please do keep your creative juices going..
..and the iron preserverance be solid steel.

Thanks and appreciated.

You spent time and effort..saving much of ours.
This is the least we can give you. Thanks.
